name: Visit Faroe Islands
summary: Do you know where Faroe Islands are? We took an expedition there and filmed all the beauty it can offer.  With this app you can fast travel there, just by putting your headset on.   You can enjoy full 360 3D videos of the nicest locations on the island and listen to spatial sounds of the nature, together with a voice over narrative text.  Feel the heights of the cliffs, observe the Puffins, stand under the waterfalls.  Embark on an exciting journey to Faroe Islands!
